title: Conaniah
html: CONANIAH(Con·a·niʹah) [Jehovah Has Firmly Established].1. The Levite in charge of the contributions for temple service during Hezekiah’s reign.—2Ch 31:4, 12, 13.2. A Levite chief among those generously contributing sheep, goats, and cattle for the great Passover celebration held in the 18th year of Josiah’s reign.—2Ch 35:9, 19.
